document.title: Pellete de liens du 12-07-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
regis_prend_une_photo.jpg (Image JPEG, 600x450 pixels) ( via ) Regis prend une photo ^^ (Tags: photo haha )
VidiPost -"Video Publishing Made Easy" ( via ) VidiPost is the easiest way to publish Audio and Video to Blogs as well as WebPages and Auction websites. (Tags: blog video )
Ubuntu Forums - Howto: Install PHP5 easily ( via ) Here is ALL the steps you need to know to get php5 installed via apt. (Tags: php howto ubuntu )
Overview and feature list for the SimpleTest PHP unit tester and web tester The heart of SimpleTest is a testing framework built around test case classes. (Tags: php unittesting )
PhpUnit - unit testing framework for PHP This is the home page for the phpUnit project, a unit-testing framework for PHP based on the "JUnit" framework for Java. (Tags: php unittesting )
Writing Tests [PHP-QAT: Quality Assurance Team] ( via ) Writing a test file is very easy if you are used to PHP. Here is an actual test file from standard module: (Tags: php unittesting )
SourceForge.net: Project Info - PHPUnit Cookbook ( via ) Heard of Unit Testing, but not sure how to use them in PHP. The "PHPUnit Cookbook" provides not only step by step instructions, but also all the code required to make it work. (Tags: php tutorial faq unittesting )
W3C buttons without images Les icones du W3C en pures CSS. (Tags: css icones )
Tentative de remboursement de Windows ( via ) Vous pouvez suivre ici la tentative de remboursement de Windows effectuee par Laurent Bayle aupres de Dell Computer. (Tags: windows soft dell matos vente-liee )
Tainted Words - Plugins Metadonnees La possibilite d'ajouter dans Dotclear, pour chaque billet, des metadonnees supplementaires. (Tags: dotclear tags folksonomies plugin )
